quest.name: The Call of the Minister
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ said that $npc:11000074$ made an order to recommend a person that could be trusted with the utmost confidentiality. I was told to go to $map:02000065$ and meet $npc:11000074$.

quest.name: The Minister's Request
quest.desc: After hearing what $npc:11000074$ said, I remember finding $item:30000174$ among the wreckage of the stolen royal carriage while chasing the red cape in $map:02000238$. At that time, $npc:11000119$ and $npc:11000074$ didn't speak much and only provided some vague answers after seeing $item:30000174$... After all, what could these two know? Let's first go to $map:02000218$ in $map:02000001$ and look for the picture $npc:11000074$ asked for.

quest.name: The Vid-Bleim Mansion
quest.desc: What could have happened in the Vid-Bleim family? $npc:11000074$, $npc:11000119$, and even $npc:11000530$... The fact that everyone is giving off such a tense vibe is making me a bit suspicious. What kind of stories will I hear if I bring back the picture to $npc:11000074$? Let's go to $map:02000190$ in $map:02000119$.

quest.name: A Daughter's Face
quest.desc: $npc:11000058$ was left alone to watch over $map:02000190$. Observing $npc:11000058$'s mood, there seems to be a silent but profound pain between her and her father $npc:11000074$... Why did $npc:11000074$ order this portrait...? Take the $item:30000182$ you received from $npc:11000058$ and return to $map:02000065$.

quest.name: Comprehending the Situation
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$ asked for assistance in finding $npc:11000069$, who has gone missing. Typically level-headed $npc:11000044$ is exhibiting an impatience you've never seen before, as she does not want to lose $npc:11000069$ to $npc:11000522$, just like her father and previous leader Win Stilton had in the past. Could $npc:11000522$ really have kidnapped $npc:11000069$?

quest.name: QUESTDESCRIPTION_10001411_NAME
quest.desc: $npc:11000258$ says that $npc:11000531$, who resents the Dark Wind, is not divulging any details regarding the disappearance of $npc:11000069$, and told me to go talk to $npc:11000531$ if I want more details.

quest.name: Start of the Clue
quest.desc: It's going to be difficult gaining any more useful information from $npc:11000531$. However, carefully tracking $npc:11000069$'s movement before the disappearance may lead to more clues that could become invaluable for this search.
quest.complete: Look for any clues between $item:39000012$ and $item:39000013$, and enter investigative questioning

quest.name: Deadliest Part-Time Job
quest.desc: $npc:11000532$ says that he was paid from a person he never met to merely borrow and return books. Just exactly who paid $npc:11000532$ to do this job? Could that person be connected to $npc:11000069$ disappearance? I still don't see how all of the clues I have really fit together, but I have no choice but to follow each clue like a trail of bread crumbs and continue my search...

quest.name: A Surreptitious Pursuit
quest.desc: $npc:11000301$ didn't see anyone suspicious looking in the area, but did mention that there is an area below the moving bone bridge in $map:02000045$ that hasn't started construction and could be a perfect place for someone to hide. If this person went through such great lengths to stay hidden, what $npc:11000301$ said about dark and hidden places is likely to be true, and these locations could possibly unearth some vital clues.
quest.manual: Look for the hideout beneath the moving bone bridge in $map:02000045$

quest.name: Perion and Yamarcha
quest.desc: You found the words Yamarcha and $map:02000051$ written on the dusty walls of $map:02000223$. I'm pretty sure $map:02000051$ is the name of a location, but Yamarcha... What could that mean...? Would the people in $map:02000051$ know the meaning behind this?
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000051$ and find out what Yamarcha means

quest.name: The Pursuit of Meaning
quest.desc: $npc:11000018$ apologized for not knowing what Yamarcha means, but was still helpful enough to refer me to $npc:11000136$. $npcName:11000136$, a unique girl that can tame savage wolves as if they were mere puppies... Could she possibly know what Yamarcha means?

quest.name: Holding Back Reinforcements
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ suddenly held back the $map:02000146$ Defender reinforcements, even though $npc:11000044$ is leading the Dark Wind. Suspending the Defender reinforcements out of nowhere like this... Could there have been a more dangerous and urgent situation than the protection of $map:02000146$?

quest.name: Praise the Pigming
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$ asked me to fill the $item:30000086$ in $map:02000077$, and take it to $npc:11000039$ in $map:02000049$. Would $npc:11000039$ know about Yamarcha?

quest.name: Enemy of the Pigming
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$ explained that the Yamarcha was one of the tribes that existed in ancient Perion, and asked me to stop the Inakimos that were prowling around the altar attempting to interrupt the Pigmings' tribal activities. Let's go to $map:02000049$ and defeat the strange $npc:21000332$ and $npc:21000333$, who were continuously flapping their wings, and return to $npc:11000039$ to learn more about the Yamarcha.

quest.name: Murpagoth's Eagle
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$ relays the story of the Yamarcha's insatiable lust for power, and their subsequent decline after falling for a demon's trap. Yamarcha...the only clue that was left in $map:02000223$... The answer is still shrouded in mystery. Will I be able to find $npc:11000069$ using only this clue? I wish Perion's chief $npc:11000069$ would return soon since he is the only person I feel is capable of unraveling this mystery, thanks to his vast knowledge about the Yamarcha... There are five Murpagoth's eagles in $map:02000049$. The eagles all sit along the edges of the cliffs on the east, west, south, and north sides. I think it'd be a good idea to send an eagle to the chief!

quest.name: Prison Pen Pals
quest.desc: Unable to face $npc:11000526$, who has been connected to the death of $npc:11000492$, $npc:11000012$ of $map:02000001$ requested that a letter be delivered to $npc:11000526$, who is currently trapped in $map:02000310$.

quest.name: Nelph's Keepsake
quest.desc: $npc:11000526$, currently trapped in $map:02000310$, handed over $npc:11000492$'s keepsake, a tape containing an audio message from $npc:11000492$ for $npc:11000492$'s blind mother, and asked to have it delivered to $npc:11000178$ in $map:02000076$.

quest.name: Broken Promises
quest.desc: Being blind, $npc:11000178$ gave $item:30000342$ back and asked to have the audio message be played for her. Find the small audio player next to the bed in $map:02000198$ and play $item:30000342$.

quest.name: Red Dead Witness
quest.desc: $map:02000001$'s $npc:11000119$ said that the red caped man was found at $map:02000117$, counterattacking with $npc:23000008$ when $npc:23000001$ fell in combat. The search began quickly after the report came in, but there has been no news from the guards themselves... Did something happen to them? No time to waste! Go find out what happened at $map:02000117$!

quest.name: Traversing the Cliff Cave
quest.desc: $map:02000117$'s $npc:11000549$ saw the guards locked in fierce combat at $map:02000238$ below the cliff. $map:02000238$ is now unusually still and quiet... Just exactly happened there? Return to $map:02000117$'s $map:02000238$.

quest.name: Battle of Cliff Cave
quest.desc: $npc:11000551$, who fell in $map:02000238$, could no longer continue speaking due to the immense pain. $map:02000238$ seems to be a trap set for the red cape's pursuers. I can lend a hand to the guards who are currently engaged in an intense battle with the monsters from $map:02000238$.
quest.manual: Take care of the monsters at $map:02000117$'s $map:02000238$

quest.name: The Color Green
quest.desc: You managed to discover $item:30000174$ from a broken wagon deep inside $map:02000238$. Ask $npc:11000551$ to find out more information about it.
quest.manual: Pick up $item:30000174$ from the $npc:11000550$ wreck at $map:02000117$'s $map:02000238$

quest.name: Harbinger of Doom
quest.desc: When the Royal Guard came to check her safety, $npc:11000058$'s intuition told her that something had happened to $npc:11000074$. Was she right in thinking that something bad had happened...? Let's go to $map:02000001$'s $npc:11000119$ and learn what exactly transpired.

quest.name: Chasing Footprints
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ seems to place great priority on the value of justice. As $npc:11000119$ said, the world is full of disagreements, and everyone has their own personal reasons for their own perspective. I suppose then it does make sense that some people would see merit in the concept of sacrificing the few for the good of the many... $npc:11000075$ must also have carefully considered the options after $npc:11000057$ returned as a servant of evil... Let's trust $npc:11000075$ for now and join the Royal Guard Chasers following $npc:11000057$ as $npc:11000119$ says.
quest.complete: Find the Royal Guard Chasers at $map:02000053$

quest.name: Endless Pursuit
quest.desc: I saw $npc:11000602$ collapsed in the alleyway in $map:02000053$, which leads to $map:02000090$. He seemed to be more concerned about the other members who were hot on the tail of the red-caped figure. Let's head to $map:02000090$ before anything else.
quest.complete: Find the Royal Guard Chasers at $map:02000090$

quest.name: Inside the Forest of Chaos
quest.desc: Deep inside $map:02000090$, the Royal Guard Chasers were found collapsed and severely injured near the entrance of $map:02000206$. $npc:11000603$ was still somewhat conscious, and said that $npc:23000025$ emerged from the deep, dark $map:02000206$ to protect the red cape from the Royal Guard Chasers. Let's not take any chances and head to $map:02000001$ to report to $npc:11000119$ and request for backup.

quest.name: The Fog Sets In
quest.desc: As $npc:23000025$'s punishment is prepared, $npc:11000119$ requested that the $npc:11000057$'s news be delivered to $npc:11000075$.

quest.name: Conflicting Hearts
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$'s resolve to return to $npc:11000057$ seems to be unshaken. Despite the difficult decision, even for $npcTitle:11000075$, who is essentially the guardian of Maple World, her firm determination is a testament to her unbreakable will. How will $npc:11000074$ respond to $npcTitle:11000075$'s resolve...?

quest.name: Know Thy Enemy
quest.desc: In order to defeat $npc:23000025$, the Royal Guards have been collecting all sorts of information. $npcName:11000169$ wants to make up for not having been able to properly protect the armory, but his timid personality that makes him shy and fidgety in front of women is worrisome. Let's go to $map:02000031$ in $npc:11000169$'s place and retrieve the Book of Shadow Healing from $npc:11000005$.

quest.name: The Book of Legends
quest.desc: $map:02000031$'s $npc:11000005$ said that more can be learned about the Book of Shadow Healing from $map:02000023$'s $npc:11000033$.

quest.name: Apollo the Genius
quest.desc: $npc:11000033$ said that the last person who read the Book of Shadow Healing, $npc:11000604$, might remember the contents of the tome. Let's look for $npc:11000604$ at $map:02000023$'s $map:02000109$.

quest.name: A Fastidious Demand
quest.desc: $npc:11000604$ will share the information related to $npc:23000025$ from Book of Shadow Healing...if I bring $item:30000179$. Let's defeat $npc:22090107$, often found in $map:02000112$ near $map:02000023$, and bring back $item:30000179$.

quest.name: The Brothers Grim
quest.desc:
Here are the passages in the Book of Shadow Healing pertaining to the Baphomet Brothers...
"The Baphomet Brothers were immensely powerful demons who were able to open their eyes and see through the darkness of the Demon King. The eldest, $npc:23000026$ was filled with unspeakable evil, the second, $npc:23000025$ was overflowing with wickedness, and the third, $npc:23000024$ was consumed with pure insanity, annihilating everything in its wake. $npc:23000025$ was the one responsible for engulfing $map:02000023$ with darkness and chaos...which is why it is now called $map:02000206$. As the source of chaos overwhelming the forest stems $item:30000190$, once $npc:23000025$ loses control of it, only then will the Shadow of Chaos be diminished."
There appears to be even more information, but much of the text has withered away...

quest.name: Wisdom of a Sage
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ said that $map:02000023$'s $npc:11000031$ might be able to find a way to rescue $npc:11000057$, and asked me to deliver a letter.

quest.name: Library of the Forest
quest.desc: $npc:11000031$ told me to find $map:02000019$ in $map:02000019$ and bring back $item:30000191$ from $npc:11000282$.
quest.complete: Find and enter $map:02000019$ in $map:02000215$ to meet with $npc:11000282$

quest.name: Curse of Akabonari
quest.desc: $npc:11000282$ was finicky for a long time. Looking for the hidden $map:02000219$ in a library this large... Guess I don't have much of a choice. Since it's been said that $map:02000219$ is hidden behind a bookcase, let's first find the bookcases that can be moved in $map:02000019$ and try pushing them.
quest.manual: Find $map:02000219$ hidden behind a bookcase in $map:02000019$ | Find $item:30000191$ in $map:02000219$

quest.name: Confirming the Legend
quest.desc: $map:02000019$'s $npc:11000282$ said that in order to obtain $item:30000191$, I must find Hephaestus's travel log, figure out where he hid $item:30000184$, and bring $item:30000184$ back. As it is somewhat of a convoluted request, there is no time to waste, especially considering the urgency at which $npc:11000031$ wants $item:30000191$ back. Let's first search the bookshelves in $map:02000019$ for Hephaestus's travel log!
quest.manual: Search $map:02000019$'s bookshelves to find $item:39000008$ | Go to the marked location on $item:39000008$ and find $item:30000184$

quest.name: Witchin' Treasure
quest.desc: Considering all the difficulty $npc:11000282$ went through in order to obtain $item:30000191$, I guess it shouldn't be a surprise that analyzing the contents have also taken an excruciatingly long time. Fortunately, the everything that's been learned thus far made it clear that $item:30000187$ is necessary. $item:30000187$, the treasure of the witches that is passed from one generation to the next... Can it be obtained?

quest.name: Orb of Souls
quest.desc: $npc:11000304$ divulged the hidden location of $item:30000187$, and imparted some particularly deep and profound messages. Although I can't seem to get $npcName:11000304$'s messages out of my mind, let's try to push that to the side and find $item:30000187$ first before returning. Let's also find the fairy $npcName:11000284$ in the center of $map:02000006$'s large lake and look around the pink-leafed tree for the hidden passageway that goes under the lake. The jar hidden in the bottom of the lake contains $item:30000187$.
quest.manual: Find $item:30000187$ at the bottom of $map:02000006$'s lake

quest.name: You Can Never Be Too Careful
quest.desc: Although $npc:11000031$ finished decoding $item:30000191$'s records and secured $item:30000187$, there seems to be a bigger issue at hand. Using the witches' Soul Curse spell to save $npc:11000057$ runs the risk of throwing off balance one of the powers that drives this world, the balance of life itself. What will $npcTitle:11000075$ decide to do...? Let's return to $map:02000025$ and meet $npc:11000075$.

quest.name: What a Witch Wants
quest.desc: As expected, $npc:11000304$ was not willing to lend out $item:30000187$ so easily. Considering the circumstances, I guess I can't say I'm all that surprised. Let's go to $map:02000113$ and bring $npc:21000266$'s prey, $item:30000072$.

quest.name: Specialized Order
quest.desc: After careful deliberation, $npc:11000075$ ordered me to enter $map:02000220$. It's possible that a live being entering $map:02000220$ can disturb the order of life... But if this is necessary to ensure the current world does not fall into confusion and chaos, then such an act should not be solely viewed as transgression against the very nature of life itself. It's time to go to $map:02000023$ and meet $npc:11000031$.

quest.name: The Chief of Perion
quest.desc: Perion Chief $npc:11000134$ has returned! I should go meet with him and hear more about Yamarcha.

quest.name: Muphaza the Wolf King
quest.desc: I'll meet with $npc:11000078$ at $map:02000170$ as $npc:11000134$ said.

quest.name: Unexpected Discovery
quest.desc: I found a suspicious bag in $map:02000229$... My first instinct was that this was $npc:11000069$'s bag.
quest.manual: Find clues from the bag behind $map:02000229$'s altar

quest.name: A Heartwarming Reunion
quest.desc: To meet $npc:11000407$ here, who regaled me with so many stories during the Maple Island days... The nostalgia warms my heart. $npc:11000407$ shared everything, all the way from the first encounter with $npc:11000064$, to how $npc:11000064$ left for the Land of Darkness to save $npc:11000069$. $npc:11000064$ left a letter for $npc:11000529$ before leaving! I wonder what kind of message he left to one of his most dependable friends? Let's go to $map:02000166$'s $map:02000208$ and deliver $item:30000340$ to $npc:11000529$.

quest.name: Unyielding Friendship
quest.desc:
$item:30000340$ contained a request for $npc:11000529$'s help, as $npc:11000069$ left alone for Katramus, the slave's tower. Overjoyed at the news that $npc:11000064$ is still alive, $npc:11000529$ began preparing to leave for Katramus without a moment's hesitation. He left one piece of advice before he left...
"Remember, you still have time to listen to the entire story from $npc:11000064$ first before relaying the news of $npc:11000064$ to $npc:11000044$."
It is now up to me to decide how much should be reported to $npc:11000044$. Let's first go to $map:02000100$'s $map:02000152$ and meet $npc:11000044$.

quest.name: The Final Gift
quest.desc: After sharing $map:02000229$'s location, $npc:11000078$ asked me to help free the trapped soul of his fallen friend, the Red Wolf King Machar. Let's carefully take $item:30000076$ from $npc:11000078$ and travel to the entrance of $map:02000229$ in the red lands below the center of $map:02000170$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters at $map:02000229$ | Free Machar's soul with the embers of purification at $map:02000229$

quest.name: Witness Protection
quest.desc: $npc:11000529$ could not help but show unbridled joy while meeting with $npc:11000064$ at Katramus. Although it isn't completely credible, $npc:11000529$ said that there has been an anonymous informant who can reveal $npc:11000044$'s true identity, and that he must be found before the Dark Wind finds him.

quest.name: No Corner Left Behind
quest.desc: $npc:11001021$ at $map:02000279$ requested that I conduct a thorough investigation of $map:02000307$. I'll head to $map:02000307$'s entrance, which is right behind $npc:11001021$.
quest.manual: Enter through $map:02000307$'s entrance behind $npc:11001021$ and defeat the monsters

quest.name: Everybody Loves Raymon
quest.desc: The anonymous informant from $map:02000279$... He was $npc:11000526$, thought to have been dead for a long time now. $npc:11000526$ said that both the robbery of the armory and the death of $npc:11000492$ are $npc:11000044$'s doings, and that the proof can be found behind $map:02000226$'s wall clock.

quest.name: Decisive Evidence
quest.desc: $npc:11001021$ told me to go to $map:02000139$ and look behind $map:02000226$'s wall clock. $map:02000226$ can be reached by going up through $map:02000225$.
quest.manual: Find the evidence behind $map:02000226$'s wall clock at $map:02000139$

quest.name: The Unusual Suspect
quest.desc: $npc:11000529$ said that $npc:11000044$ can be proven to be guilty with testimony from $npc:11000526$ and $item:30000075$ as evidence. I was told to go to $map:02000152$ and make sure $npc:11000044$ cannot run away.

quest.name: Into Thin Air
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$ has already left $map:02000153$ and vanished. It's apparent that $npc:11000044$ already figured out what was going on and hid. I should return to $map:02000208$ and tell $npc:11000529$ the news.

quest.name: Flip Flopped
quest.desc: $npc:11000529$ told me to show $item:30000075$ to $map:02000001$'s $npc:11000119$ and say that a bounty must be set for $npc:11000044$.

quest.name: Reporting Facts
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ told me to report everything to $npcName:11000075$.

quest.name: The Great Rescue
quest.desc: The doppelganger of $npc:11000685$, the absolute good...$npc:11000068$, the absolute evil! Until $npc:11000068$ is sealed away back into the Shadow World, not even Green Lapenta's safety is guaranteed... This is a crisis that only the Defenders, the guardians of the world, must resolve. It's vital that $npc:11000057$'s rescue plan first be executed. Let's find the door to $map:02000227$ near the Green Lapenta's apparition at the lowest part of $map:02000023$.
quest.manual: Receive $item:30000107$ from $npc:11000031$ at $map:02000023$'s $map:02000035$ | Find and enter $map:02000227$'s entrance near Lapenta's apparition

quest.name: Soul Dimension
quest.desc: $npc:11000685$ in $map:02000227$ said that in order to diminish the impact of the fissure from both life and soul, the Spirit Lantern must be absorbed. Let's enter $map:02000220$ after absorbing the Spirit Lantern behind $npc:11000685$.
quest.manual: Receive $item:30000107$ from $npc:11000685$ at $map:02000227$ | Enter $map:02000220$ after absorbing the Spirit Lantern

quest.name: No Turning Back
quest.desc: Bella was found hardened like a rock at $map:02000220$, and was unresponsive to $item:30000107$. Just what in the world happened to Bella's soul...?

quest.name: A Lost Hope
quest.desc: It seems like the only hope of saving $npc:11000057$ has been extinguished.

quest.name: Back to Square One
quest.desc: The memories of all the work I did for $npc:11000282$ and $npc:11000304$ with the hopes of saving $npc:11000057$ from the Demon King flashed before my eyes. But now... Everything's back to square one... Is it time to give up trying to save $npc:11000057$...?

quest.name: A Hole That Cannot Be Filled
quest.desc: Unable to see $npc:11000074$ face to face, $npc:11000075$ asked me to deliver the news along with some words of consolation to $npc:11000057$.

quest.name: A Word A Day
quest.desc: $npc:11000074$ asked me to deliver the news that $npc:11000057$ will not be returning, so that $npc:11000057$ will not have to suffer more from any pretense of false hope.

quest.name: Incoming Storm
quest.desc: $npc:11000076$ said that $npc:11000057$ and his minions stormed $map:02000146$ and attempted to overtake it. I was asked to join the reinforcements $npc:11000119$ and $npc:11000057$ brought in order to track $npc:11000057$ down. Let's find an entrance to a tunnel near the path to $map:02000145$!
quest.complete: Find $map:02000237$ in $map:02000146$ and join the reinforcements

quest.name: Light at the End of the Tunnel
quest.desc: The reinforcements $npc:11000119$ and $npc:11000015$ brought from $map:02000237$ have already been almost completely obliterated. $npcName:11000015$ told me to leave the injured $npcName:11000119$ with him and to continue pursuing $npc:11000057$.

quest.name: The One That Got Away
quest.desc: $npc:11000703$, who was injured while pursuing $npc:11000057$, told me to return to the Defender's Alliance HQ and request for reinforcements to continue chasing $npc:11000057$.

quest.name: Lennon the Defender
quest.desc: $map:02000146$'s $npc:11000076$ said that $npc:11000064$ has joined the Defenders, and asked that I go see him at $map:02000228$.

quest.name: Facing the Darkness
quest.desc: $npc:11000069$ said that $npc:11000064$ went after $npc:11000044$ into $map:52000003$ and asked me to help $npc:11000064$ stay safe.

quest.name: Losing Hope
quest.desc: $npc:11000058$ told me to find $npc:11000869$, a researcher who has been assigned to investigate the Lidibrium area by the Chaos Time Center, and inquire if time travel is possible with the Red Lapenta's powers.
quest.complete: Find the Chaos Time Center's researcher at $map:02000008$

quest.name: Grasping at the Straws of Time
quest.desc: Left alone in $map:02000008$, $npc:11000868$ said that $npc:11000869$ can be found at $map:02000142$.

quest.name: Come on Feel the Noise
quest.desc: $npc:11000869$ asked me to defeat the monsters of $map:02000142$, who are disrupting the research with an abundance of noise.

quest.name: A Daughter's Letter
quest.desc: $npcTitle:11000074$ from $map:2000190$'s daughter, $npcName:11000058$, is requesting the delivery of a letter to her father at $map:2000065$ of $map:2000001$. Let's get to $map:2000065$ of $map:2000001$ and meet $npcTitle:11000074$.

quest.name: Location of Ermen
quest.desc: $npc:11000074$ says $npcName:11000058$ left a farewell letter before running off to find a way to save $npcName:11000057$, and that $npcName:11000058$ must be found before she falls to danger. I'll have to find $npc:11000012$ in $map:2000001$ and see if there is any unique mail that has been delivered to $map:2000190$ recently.

quest.name: The Place She Left
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$ said that a few days ago, a thick research packet was delivered from $map:2000309$ of $map:2000270$ to $map:2000190$. Let's go to $map:2000309$ of $map:2000270$ and investigate.

quest.name: Traces of Invasion
quest.desc: $map:2000309$ of $map:2000270$ was left a mess in the wake of an unidentified assailant. Luckily, $npc:11000843$ in $map:2000309$ handed over $item:30000380$, which may have the assailant's image caught on it. First I need to find out if the video data can be recovered. I'll need to take $item:30000380$ to $map:2000324$ and meet with $npc:11001097$.

quest.name: A Factory in Stasis
quest.desc: $npc:11001097$ of $map:2000324$ says that in order to recover the video, the generator that the monsters attacked must be reconnected. If I find the generator installed at the edge of $map:2000277$, I should be able to turn it on.
quest.manual: Defeat the robot monster at $map:2000277$|Operate $map:2000277$'s generator

quest.name: Unidentified Truth
quest.desc: $npc:11001097$ of $map:2000324$ found indiscernible scenes within the recovered video and asked that I return to $map:2000309$ and check with $npc:11000843$.

quest.name: Tremor of Time
quest.desc: At $map:2000276$, $npc:11000843$ has found a strange signal coming from the time energy that flows along the Time Barrier. Could it be connected to the incident at $map:2000309$? First, let's get to $map:2000276$ and assess the situation.

quest.name: Dynamic Energy Research
quest.desc: $npc:11001098$ of $map:2000276$ requested an analysis of all the data on the dynamic detection device. Let's go and collect all the $item:30000382$ in $map:2000276$.

quest.name: Questions in the Code
quest.desc: $npc:11001098$ of $map:2000276$, confused, said that there was something strange in the results of the analysis from the data collection of $item:30000382$. Let's return to $map:2000309$ of $map:2000270$ and give $item:30000383$ to $npc:11000843$.

quest.name: Into the Time Barrier
quest.desc: When $npc:11000843$ of $map:2000309$ placed $item:30000383$ in the time matrix of the research lab, the time matrix turned on and the entrance to $map:52000011$ opened. Let's go to $map:52000011$!

quest.name: The Trembling Time Barrier
quest.desc: $npc:11001099$ at $map:52000011$ stated that an unidentified strength shook $map:52000011$ and made it unstable. A request was made to help stabilize $map:52000011$. With $npc:11001099$, we should be able to defeat the monsters threatening $map:52000011$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters within $map:52000011$, which is connected through $map:2000309$, and stabilize the barrier

quest.name: Back to Reality
quest.desc: $npc:11001099$ at $map:52000011$, wishing to show gratitude, told me to go ask $npc:11000843$ to aid in the cause of discovering the shaking in $map:52000011$. I should return to $map:2000270$ $map:2000309$ and meet $npc:11000843$.

quest.name: Combination of Clues
quest.desc: Upon hearing of the situation in $map:52000011$, $npc:11000843$ of $map:2000309$ stated that he would personally go to $map:2000298$ and chase the unidentified assailants following the chaos time key log in an attempt to control time. He asks I return to $map:2000001$ and report on the situation at $map:52000011$ and $map:2000309$.

quest.name: Guardian of Time
quest.desc: After understanding the seriousness of the situation, $npc:11000074$ ordered $npcTitle:11000075$ to explain in further detail.

quest.name: The Red Lapenta's Truth
quest.desc: After receiving reports on the situation, $npc:11000075$ revealed that not only is the guardian protecting the Lapenta, but the Lapenta has also shown the willpower to protect the guardian. He tells me that what probably drew me to $map:52000011$ was the Red Lapenta's willpower. Accepting the idea around the Red Lapenta, $npc:11000075$ requested that I remain a reliable comrade to $npc:11000015$ until the power threatening $map:52000011$ is completely uprooted.

quest.name: In the Details
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ requested that I care for $npc:11000058$, who has returned from $map:2000298$, and watch for any sign of injuries. Let's get to $map:2000190$ of $map:2000119$ and meet $npc:11000058$.

quest.name: Red Lapenta Guardian
quest.desc: $npc:11000058$ saw $npc:11001113$ at $map:2000304$ and asked the Red Lapenta guardian to find a way to put $npc:11000057$ back in the original place. While a difficult request, $npc:11000058$'s eyes are filled with desperation. I should get to $map:2000076$ and meet $npc:11000015$.

quest.name: Coexist as One
quest.desc: $npc:11000015$ of $map:2000076$ revealed that when the time floor at $map:2000304$ froze, the past and present became one at that moment... I've been ordered to go into $map:2000016$ and meet $npc:11000845$. Could $npc:11000845$ know a way to protect $npc:11001113$'s soul vial? FirstI must get to $map:2000016$!

quest.name: Labyrinth
quest.desc: $npc:11000845$, met in $map:2000016$'s past, said the only way to save $npc:11001113$ is to find where $npc:11001113$ was before the order of time is completely restored and the past closes. The only clue to go by is the giant orb of evil energy that was situated behind $npc:11001113$! I must hurry to $map:2000076$ and meet $npc:11000015$.

quest.name: The Returned
quest.desc: $npc:11000015$ of $map:2000076$ believes that $npc:11001113$ is somewhere in the Land of Darkness, and recommends traveling to $map:3009017$ to talk to the people who were rescued from Katramus. $map:3009017$ can be found at $map:3000143$, in the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: Asking Survivors
quest.desc: $npc:11000069$ was unexpectedly encountered at $map:3009017$. He had come with $npc:11000064$ to take care of the Katramus rescuers. As for the giant orb of evil energy, he said to ask the rescuers, as they've lived in the Land of Darkness for a long time.

quest.name: Legendary Terror
quest.desc: $npc:11001106$ of $map:3009017$ called the giant demonic orb the "Soul Orb" and said that it was located in $map:52000012$. Let's find out if anyone knows where $map:52000012$ is.

quest.name: Children's Stories
quest.desc: $npc:11001107$ of $map:3009017$ overheard the Katramus supervisors say that $map:52000012$ is located in $map:3000007$.

quest.name: Past a Fierce Wind
quest.desc: $npc:11000069$ heard that $npc:11000064$ is at $map:3009018$ in $map:3000007$, but says to find $npc:11000064$ first.

quest.name: Faith Maintained
quest.desc: Having heard all the circumstances, $npc:11000064$ agreed to come along to $map:52000012$ to help save $npc:11000057$.

quest.name: Once More, Together Now!
quest.desc: $npc:11000064$ said we should hurry and find the entrance to $map:52000012$ that $npc:11000807$ told us about before the order of time completely restores. Let's find $map:52000012$ near the road going from $map:3000007$ to $map:3000021$.

quest.name: QUESTDESCRIPTION_10002611_NAME
quest.desc: $npc:11000064$ said to go into $map:52000013$ and look for $npc:11001113$'s soul. ...I recall a heartbreaking memory of returning to $map:2000220$ and falling to my knees before the hardened $npc:11001112$. Will I be able to save $npc:11001112$ this time? I will enter $map:52000013$, the place standing in the middle of $map:52000012$.

quest.name: Like a Dream
quest.desc: Did I lose consciousness at $map:52000013$? That flashing glare... I woke up at $map:3009017$. As I was wandering around $map:52000013$, the order of time must have been restored, and in the process of $map:52000012$ returning to the present I must have been tossed from $map:52000013$. The memory of $npc:11001112$, though like a dream, feels all too real... I'll head to $map:2000190$ and share the news of $npc:11000057$ with $npc:11000058$.

quest.name: Feeling Bella
quest.desc: Having heard news of $npc:11000057$, $npc:11000058$ says she felt the exact memories and emotions as when they were growing up together. It must be a special bond between the twin sisters... Let's go to $map:2000001$ $map:2000065$ and share $npc:11000057$'s news with $npc:11000074$.

quest.name: Striving for Desire
quest.desc: After hearing news of $npc:11000057$, $npc:11000074$ became speechless as the sadness, guilt, and remorse toward his daughter sank in. In that instant I witnessed the soft-hearted father hidden behind the dignity and grace of the kingdom's royal minister. If time could be reversed...would $npcName:11000074$ make the same decision? If he had saved $npc:11000057$ instead of $npc:11000075$, how different would the world be...? It seems like $npcName:11000074$ is lost in guilt and sadness, and needs some time to himself. I should head to $map:2000025$ and share $npc:11000057$'s news with $npcTitle:11000075$.

quest.name: Die Allianz schlgt zurck
quest.desc: Die Invasion von Tria hat viele Leben gekostet so auch das von Joddy, der bis zum Ende tapfer gekmpft hat. Aber der letzte Angriff hat den Willen von $npcName:11000075$, Verbndete zu suchen und mit ihnen gemeinsam gegen die Dunkelheit zu kmpfen, nur weiter gestrkt.

quest.name: Die Vergessenen
quest.desc: Bis jetzt wurden Tria und die Verbndeten von den Mchten der Finsternis gezwungen, sich lediglich zu verteidigen. Kaiserin $npcName:11000075$ fragt sich, ob Madrias Drache vielleicht von den Lumarianern abstammt, einer uralte Drachenspezies, die vor langer Zeit verschwand. Hauptmann Allon berichtet, dass drachenhnliche Monster auf der Jumeiinsel aufgetaucht sind. Das knnte die Gelegenheit sein, um zurckzuschlagen.
quest.manual: Tritt der Allianz in der $map:52000087$ bei.

quest.name: Auf in ein neues Land
quest.desc:
Die Maple-Allianz hat ihr vorbergehendes Hauptquartier in $map:02010002$ auf der Jumeiinsel eingerichtet. Allerdings ist die See rund um die Insel seit kurzer Zeit unruhig, weshalb $npc:11000076$ fr die Reise dorthin ein besonderes Schiff beauftragen musste.
Suche $npc:11001276$ in der $map:02000183$, um eine Fahrt zu buchen.

quest.name: Die Erde ruft
quest.desc: $npcName:11001276$ ist der Erfinder des fliegenden Schiffes namens Lumiwind. Leider ging es nach seinem Jungfernflug zu Bruch. Lass dir die ganze Geschichte von $npcName:11001276$ erzhlen.

quest.name: Der Erfinder im Ruhestand
quest.desc: $npcName:11001011$ ist der Ingenieur, der $npc:11001276$ dabei geholfen hat, die Lumiwind zu bauen. Er ist der einzige, der das Schiff reparieren kann, aber er hat sich vor Kurzem bei den $map:02000182$ zur Ruhe gesetzt.

quest.name: Seine Geschichte
quest.desc: $npcName:11001011$ hat seine Jugend damit verbracht, die Lumiwind zu bauen. Aber als er mit dem Bau fast fertig war, merkte er, dass er seine Familie die ganze Zeit vernachlssigt hatte. Die Lumiwind war seine Leidenschaft, aber das war es trotzdem nicht wert, seine Familie dafr zu verlieren...

quest.name: Die Lumiwind und meine Jugend
quest.desc: $npcName:11001011$ hat sich stur dagegen gewehrt, bei den Reparaturen der Lumiwind zu helfen... Das heit, bis du seinen Stolz als Ingenieur verletzt hast. Damit seine Familie aber nichts davon mitbekommt, musst du dich um die Arbeiten in seinem Haushalt kmmern, bis er die Lumiwind auf Vordermann gebracht hat. Heutige Aufgabe: Piraten bei den $map:02000182$ bekmpfen.

quest.name: ber den Wolken
quest.desc: $npcName:11001011$ hat die Reparaturen abgeschlossen. Kehre zur $map:02000183$ zurck und sprich mit $npcName:11001276$ ber den Transportflug mit der Lumiwind.

quest.name: Ein Land in der Wste
quest.desc: $npcName:11001276$ lsst dich auf der Lumiwind zur Jumeiinsel fliegen. Triff seinen Assistenten $npcName:11001403$ und frage nach dem Weg zur $map:02010059$.

quest.name: Das Quartier fern der Heimat
quest.desc: Da du jetzt auf der Jumeiinsel angekommen bist, wird es Zeit, dich zur $map:02010059$ in $map:02010002$ zu begeben. Triff $npcName:11001310$ in $map:02010002$.

quest.name: Ein unerwartetes Problem
quest.desc: Laut $npcName:11001310$ gehen seltsame Dinge auf der Jumeiinsel vor sich. Lass dir von $npcName:11001311$ in der $map:02010059$ mehr darber erzhlen.

quest.name: Taten sind besser als Worte
quest.desc: Die Wachen sind vor Angst gelhmt, seit sie von dem Angriff auf $map:02000001$ gehrt haben. Sie haben keine Fortschritte erzielt, aber aus irgendeinem Grund hlt sich der Mafiaboss $npcName:11000251$ in der Stadt auf. Vielleicht verfgt er ber brauchbare Informationen. Suche ihn in der $map:02010020$.

quest.name: Eine zwielichtige Begegnung
quest.desc: Nachdem du die Gangster der Dunkelsterne auf ihre Pltze verwiesen hast, hat der $npcName:11003119$ fr dich ein Treffen mit $npcName:11000251$ arrangiert. Triff ihn in der $map:52010010$.

quest.name: Der Zug der Verbrecher
quest.desc: Im Austausch fr seine Informationen mchte $npcName:11000251$, dass du den Zug zurckbringst, der ihm und seinen Leuten gestohlen wurde. Bezwinge die Banditen, die den Blaknov an sich gerissen haben.
quest.manual: Bezwinge $npcName:24001507$ im Dungeon Blaknov Nr.1.|Bezwinge $npcName:24002109$ im Dungeon Blaknov Nr.2.

quest.name: Unfairer Handel
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000251$ zufolge sucht das drachenartige Geschpf genau wie du nach Spuren der Lumarianer. Obwohl diese Drachenspezies nicht mehr existiert, gibt es bestimmt Kinder, die noch ihr Vermchtnis in sich tragen. Er wird dir mehr erzhlen... gegen Geld.
Begib dich zum $map:02010019$ und schau, wie du $npcName:11001342$ bei dem Problem mit den Kfern helfen kannst.

quest.name: Kferangriff
quest.desc: Ein Kferschwarm ist im $map:02010019$ eingefallen, und es ist unmglich, den Betrieb weiterzufhren. Du weit, was zu tun ist.

quest.name: Ungeziefervernichtung
quest.desc: Die Kferbedrohung liegt in den letzten Zgen es ist Zeit, die Aufgabe zu Ende zu bringen! Begib dich zum $map:02010019$ und bezwinge den Knig der Kfer, den $npcName:23190066$!

quest.name: Unter Dach und Fach
quest.desc: Nachdem $npcName:11001342$ sich bei dir bedankt hat, weil du den Park, seinen Job und seine letzte Chance auf Glck gerettet hast, sagt er dir, dass du zum Hauptquartier zurckkehren und dir deine Bezahlung abholen sollst. Sprich mit $npcName:11000251$ in der $map:52010010$.

quest.name: Die vier Kinder
quest.desc:
Von Biset, dem letzten Drachenmeister, wird erzhlt, dass er starb, als er vier Kinder schtzte. Es heit, dass eines dieser Kinder den Lichtstein habe, ein Artefakt des Lichts, und dass der geheimnisvolle Drachenmann danach sucht.
Zwei der Kinder befinden sich in den Fngen der Dunkelsterne. Da du so freundlich zu $npcName:11000251$ warst, lsst er dich eines der Kinder sehen. Gehe zur $map:02010064$ in der $map:02010016$ und suche sie auf.
quest.complete: Sprich mit $npcName:11001297$ in der $map:02010064$ auf der $map:02010016$.

quest.name: Knigin der Rundstrecke
quest.desc: $npcName:11001297$ verlangt, dass du ihrem Freund hilfst $npcName:11001294$, ein weiteres von Bisets Mndeln. Begib dich zur $map:52010004$ in der $map:02010020$ und rette ihn vor den Dunkelsternen.

quest.name: Gefallen des Champions
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001294$ macht sich Sorgen um seine Freunde, nachdem er erfuhr, dass die Dunkelsterne hinter den Lumarianern her sind. Er mchte, dass du sicherstellst, dass die anderen beiden immer noch in Sicherheit sind.
Geh zum $map:02010053$ in $map:02010002$ und sprich mit $npcName:11001292$.

quest.name: Der reizbare Koch
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001216$ ist sich sicher, dass der Lieblingsstein von $npcName:11000735$ der Lichtstein sein muss. Er ist der Meinung, dass du die besten Chancen hast, sie zu finden, wenn du eine der hiesigen Erdmnnchenpatrouillen um Hilfe bittest.
Begib dich nach $map:02010063$ und suche nach einem Erdmnnchen namens $npcName:11001313$.

quest.name: Die erwachten Toten
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001313$ mchte, dass du eine Pyramide untersuchst, in der sich die Untoten erheben. Sie gehrte zu einem Knigreich von Lumarianer-Anbetern, aber diese verschwanden, nachdem sie der Dunkelheit erlagen. Wenn du das tust, wird er dir helfen, Mika zu finden.
Betritt den Dungeon Illusionspyramide und berichte, was du dort findest.

quest.name: In einem anderen Tempel
quest.desc: $npcName:11001313$ sah, wie ein Mdchen in den $map:02010052$ im $map:02010026$ ging. Suche sie im Dungeon $map:02010052$.

quest.name: Das Wstenvolk
quest.desc: Zwar konnte dir $npcName:11001313$ nicht helfen, das Mdchen zu finden, aber er hat von einem drachenartigen Monster gehrt. Begib dich zum $map:02010023$ und triff dich mit $npcName:11001315$, der Enkelin des Oberhaupts des Stamms der Moropapa, und frage sie nach dem Monster, das das Dorf angegriffen hat.

quest.name: Das gefallene Oberhaupt
quest.desc:
$npc:11001214$ ist vor Auenseitern auf der Hut, seit vor Jahren die Finsterlande versiegelt wurden. Seine Enkelin $npcName:11001315$ zgert, sich mit dir abzugeben... Aber sie braucht $item:30000492$, um ihren kranken Grovater zu behandeln.
Schau in den Krutergefen nach, bezwinge alle Kfer, die herauskommen, und besorge $item:30000492$ fr $npcName:11001315$.
quest.manual: Schau in Gefen nach und bezwinge Kfer, um $item:30000492$ zu erhalten.

quest.name: Die Identitt des Monsters
quest.desc: Da du so eine groe Hilfe warst, war $npcName:11001315$ damit einverstanden, dass du dich mit ihrem Grovater, dem Oberhaupt, triffst. Triff $npc:11001214$ in $map:52010011$.

quest.name: Mikas Rettung
quest.desc:
Tief im Innern des Tempels von Nazkar befindet sich das $map:52010006$. $npcName:11001214$ sagt, dass dort $npcName:11001363$ ist und du der einzige bist, der sie retten kann.
Begib dich schnell zum $map:52010006$ im $map:02010030$!

quest.name: Der Besucher aus einer anderen Welt
quest.desc:
Deinem Beispiel folgend haben die Wachen den Drachenmann verfolgt und im $map:02010055$ aufgesprt, dem Schrein der verschwundenen Merjit-Zivisilation in der $map:02010029$. Es heit, dass in dieser Kammer seinen Anfang nahm, was auch immer die Ursache des Untergangs der Merjit war...
Betritt den $map:02010055$ mit der Schaltflche Allein betreten und bereite den Plnen dieses Monsters ein Ende oder finde eine Gruppe anderer Abenteurer und stelle dich dieser Herausforderung mit einem Team.
quest.manual: Drcke Allein betreten, um dich in den Dungeon $dungeonTitle:20018002$ zu begeben, und bezwinge $npcName:23000068$.

quest.name: Wiedervereinte Freunde
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000735$ kam vorbei und bat die Wachen, dir in ihrem Namen zu danken. Du solltest sie persnlich aufsuchen, bevor du nach $map:02000001$ zurckkehrst.
Sie sollte inzwischen zurck im $map:52010014$ sein.

quest.name: Eine Sackgasse
quest.desc: Die Wachen ziehen sich von der Jumeiinsel zurck. Es wird Zeit, nach $map:02000001$ zurckzukehren. Erstatte $npc:11001969$ in der $map:52000087$ Bericht.

quest.name: Mika and Moropapa
quest.desc: As soon as I met $npc:11001314$, he yelled to get out. Will I be able to change his mind?

quest.name: Dragon's Footprints
quest.desc: Upon hearing the whole story, $npc:11001314$ said to retrieve the record left by the ancient Lumieragon. He will then decipher it and find out how $npcName:11000735$ can find her destiny.

quest.name: A Dragon's Connection
quest.desc: After receiving $item:30000471$ and $item:30000470$, $npcName:11001314$ said that as soon as $npcName:11000735$ arrives, he will begin deciphering.
quest.manual: Wait for Lumieragon to decipher the record

quest.name: Oracle of Salvation
quest.desc: $npcName:11001314$, who has found information in the ancient Lumieragon records about a special link among the Lumieragons, knows of an intermediary who can help establish the connection between Leila and $npcName:11000735$. He says to go to $map:02010026$ and find $npcName:11001258$.

quest.name: Preparing for a Ritual
quest.desc: Despite feeling uneasy about the darkness surrounding her, $npcName:11001258$ has said she will help establish the connection between Leila and $npcName:11000735$. Let's bring back $npcName:11001258$'s items that $npcName:21000694$ and $npcName:21000684$ of $map:02010026$ took.
quest.manual: Defeat the $map:02010026$ monsters and find $item:30000472$|Defeat the $map:02010026$ monsters and find $item:30000473$|Defeat the $map:02010026$ monsters and find $item:30000474$

quest.name: Lumieragon's Memory
quest.desc: $npcName:11001258$ said that when the orb of prophecy begins to react once the ritual begins, it will open up a tunnel of communication. Let's help so that Leila and Mika may safely establish a connection.
quest.manual: Help to establish the connection between Leila and $npcName:11000735$

quest.name: To Find a Memory Fragment
quest.desc: $npcName:11001258$ spoke in detail of what $npcName:11000735$ saw, which she herself observed during the connection ritual. $npcName:11001258$ also said that the memory fragment Leila sent must be found before Kargon or other servants of darkness find it. Let's find the memory fragment at $map:02010047$ and return.

quest.name: Unsolved Destiny
quest.desc: $npcName:11000735$ is standing shocked in front of an unconscious $npcName:11001258$...mumbling that before $npcName:11001258$ fainted, she said to find $npcName:11001224$ in Nazkar Temple. $npcName:11000735$ says it's urgent we find $npcName:11001224$.

quest.name: The Truth about Kabo
quest.desc: $npcName:11001224$, a member of the Naskar Temple's clergy, gives off an odd vibe...! He says he told $npcName:11000735$ that the power to find her destiny and return everything back to normal is at $map:52010006$. I should head to $map:52010006$ and help $npcName:11000735$.

quest.name: Repeat Ordeal
quest.desc: Uneasy, $npcName:11001479$ shared news about $npcName:11000735$, saying that she'd been poisoned by the shadow poison at $map:52010006$, and that the Rame Stone has been lost. Would Empress $npcName:11000075$ know of any methods to treat $npcName:11000735$ and recover the lost Rame Stone? Let's go to $map:02010059$ and meet the empress.

quest.name: The Empress's Wisdom
quest.desc: Empress $npcName:11000075$ stated that she's discovered an entrance to $map:52010007$ in $map:02010034$. If the power of light is to be maintained by $npcName:11000735$, $npcName:11000735$ must be taken to $map:52010007$ immediately. Let's return to $map:02010053$ and relay the message to $npcName:11001216$.

quest.name: To Find the Power of the Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11001216$ said that he heard about $map:52010007$ before, and that he and his friends will take $npcName:11000735$ and meet me at $map:52010007$.

quest.name: The Secret of the Temple
quest.desc: Speaking on how the power of light was weakly connected in $map:52010007$, the empress spoke of the Irunba Sanctuary of Light in $map:02010055$, where the ancient Lumieragon elders gathered to discuss connection the light. Could the Rame Stone really be in $map:02010055$ as the empress said? If that is the case...with what intentions would someone have taken the Rame Stone to $map:02010055$? First, let's find the Nazkar Temple map to help locate $map:02010055$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters in the Nazkar Temple region and find the map of Nazkar

quest.name: To Find the Sanctuary of Light
quest.desc: Empress $npcName:11000075$, disappointed after seeing the $item:30000513$, hoped that one of the dragon knights, $npcName:11001216$, $npcName:11001218$, or $npcName:11001217$, would find and bring back the torn portion of the map.
quest.manual: Wait until the dragon knights return from $map:52010007$
quest.complete: Find the dragon knights who have gone to $map:02010029$

quest.name: Dungeon: What Moore Saw
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20018002$ (Entrance: $map:02010029$) Party Size (10 players)
Scout $npcName:11001483$ was hiding and shaking by the entrance to $map:02010055$, which was discovered in $map:02010029$! Although scared, due to scout habit she didn't take her eyes off the entrance to $map:02010055$. It's clear she saw the dragon knights $npcName:11001216$, $npcName:11001218$, and $npcName:11001217$, enter. Will the dragon knights be able to find the Rame Stone in $map:02010055$? Let's get to $map:02010055$ and meet them.
quest.manual: Go into $map:02010055$ and meet the dragon knights

quest.name: With Hope
quest.desc: Still hidden by the entrance to $map:02010055$, $npc:11001483$ explained that $npcName:11001216$ and his friends just came out of $map:02010055$ and ran off claiming they had to meet the empress. I remember before I left $map:52010007$, the empress said that as soon as the Rame Stone is taken from $map:02010055$, $map:52010007$ will disappear into the darkness. She said to return to $map:02010059$ once the Rame Stone is reclaimed.

quest.name: Through the Darkness
quest.desc: How long has it been since the dragon knights recovered the Rame Stone from $npcName:23000068$ for $npcName:11000735$, who's been inflicted with shadow poison...? From $npcName:11000076$ came the delightful news that $npcName:11000735$ left to find the sacred stone carrying an ancient Lumieragon martyr who can help her overcome the shadow poison and achieve her destiny as the Light's Descendant. However, this sacred stone of the ancient Lumieragon is being kept within $map:02010055$, the place $npcName:23000068$ and the Kargon troops took over It will be too dangerous with only $npcName:11000735$ and the dragon knights... Let's follow $npcName:11000735$ and look for the $map:52010017$ entrance in $map:02010029$, which is an alternate route to $map:02010055$.

quest.name: Light Gathering
quest.desc: $npcName:11000735$, who I met in $map:52010017$, despite suffering from shadow poison, says she heard her mother's voice telling her that she needs to find the sacred stone of the ancient Lumieragon. Hearing Leila's voice could have been a miracle that rose from a mother's concern that her daughter may lose her life before fulfilling her destiny as the Light's Descendant... Let's help $npcName:11000735$ safely find the pieces of light in $map:52010017$!
quest.manual: Help $npcName:11000735$ find the pieces of light at $map:52010017$

quest.name: New Birth
quest.desc: It seems that $npcName:11000735$ and her friends were all sent to different locations when $npcName:11000735$ opened the path of light before the light's power was under control. With $npcName:11000075$, let's look for $npcName:11000735$'s party in $map:52010007$.
quest.manual: Wait for the birth of the Light's Descendant at $map:52010007$
quest.complete: Greet $npcName:11000735$, who was reborn as the Light's Descendant, at $map:52010007$

quest.name: Return with the Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11000735$, reborn as the Light's Descendant, went back to Drachenheim promising to return after defeating Drachenheim and freeing Lumieragon from the darkness with all of the Lumieragon's power intact.
quest.manual: At $map:52010007$, see $npcName:11000735$ off, who is returning to Drachenheim.

quest.name: Road to the Rune

quest.desc: $npcName:11000033$ relayed the message that $npcName:11000031$ is urgently looking for me. Let's go find $npcName:11000031$ at $map:02000035$.

quest.name: Heavy Heart
quest.desc: Having heard that the Runeblade expedition was to arrive in $map:02000063$, $npcName:11000031$ was worried that they wouldn't be able to safely arrive due to the pirates in $map:02000063$. $npcName:11000031$ requested that I go to $map:02000063$ and check out the situation. I'll head to $map:02000063$ and check if the Runeblade expedition arrived safely.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and figure out the situation inside $map:52000025$, which is located by the water in the direction of $map:02000067$

quest.name: Descendants in Danger
quest.desc: $npcName:11001567$ fell to the pirates' sudden attack. He requested that I help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team and defeat the pirates.
quest.manual: Help the expedition team and $npcName:11001229$ defeat the pirates

quest.name: A Tough Situation
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$ requested that I go back to $npcName:11000031$ to relay the Runeblade expedition's situation, and to ask for support in moving the ancient book the Runerbladers left behind to $map:02000023$.

quest.name: Asimov's Wisdom
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$ requested that I deliver the command to dispatch a wizard who can decipher the ancient book to $npcName:11000042$ at $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$, and then go to $npc:11000075$ and ask that a draft be issued to gather support for the guardians.
quest.complete: Relay the command of $npcName:11000031$ to $npcName:11000042$ at $map:02000001$ $map:02000188$

quest.name: Checking In
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ says that in order to deliver $npcName:11000031$'s command to $npcName:11000075$, I must first go meet $npcName:11000119$ and get permission to enter the palace.

quest.name: Asimov's Command
quest.desc: After hearing I've been sent to deliver $npcName:11000031$'s command to $npcName:11000075$, $npcName:11000119$ permitted me to enter the palace and meet the empress.

quest.name: The Place to Gain Trust
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ said that she will issue a draft for every guardian representative, and that we should go to $map:52000026$, where everyone is gathered, to review the current situation. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, near the top of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Reliable Time Management
quest.desc: $npcName:11000075$ says that she will provide the strength needed to gather everyone under one purpose, and has requested I return to $npcName:11000031$ in $map:02000023$ to relay the purpose of the palace.

quest.name: What Happened in Cheliska Bay
quest.desc: $npcName:11000043.$ has learned that everyone, including the adventurer from $map:02000001$, has been suffering in $map:02000063$ because of the pirates. She says to go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates to help the people who are suffering.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and help the people suffering from the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Unexpected Situation
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000043$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Without a Choice
quest.desc: $npcName:11000050$ strongly disagrees in assisting other troops who offer no help of their own. However, the Thief troop leader, Jonathan Button, has commanded that they go support the expedition. And so it appears they've no choice but to join the Starlight Expedition. Let's go to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and deliver the news to $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Outside of Interest
quest.desc: $npcName:11000051$ says there is an emergency at the palace and to get to $map:52000026$ immediately. $npc:11000051$ seems irritated and hopes it's not all a waste of time... The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Interest Is Poison
quest.desc: It wasn't something the assassin was part of, says $npcName:11000051$. Nevertheless, $npcName:11000006$ asked what the emergency was about. $npcName:11000051$ requested I go to $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$ and relay what happened at the banquet hall to $npcName:11000006$.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000006$ at $map:02000208$ located somewhere in $map:02000166$

quest.name: Individual Duty
quest.desc: $npcName:11000529$ shook his head nonchalantly at $npcName:11000051$'s words, and said an assassin just needs to do an assassin's job. $npc:11000529$ says I should help $npcName:11000051$, who was going to $map:52000027$ alone. A Humples member went undercover into Darkstar in order to reveal the link between $npc:11000065$ and $npcName:11000251$, but was caught and isolated in $map:52000027$. We must rescue him as well as acquire the evidence. Let's go to $map:52000027$ to help $npcName:11000051$ rescue the isolated Humples member.
quest.manual: Help $npcName:11000051$ at $map:52000027$ and secure the evidence

quest.name: A Courageous Act
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ says that $npcName:11000051$ took the Humples member and the Runeblader to the hospital. $npcName:11000006$ also says that the Humples member was able to stay alive before $npcName:11000051e$ got there because of the Runeblader. Touched by the courageous act of the Runeblader protecting one of his men, $npcName:11000006$ revealed that he will join the Starlight Expedition. $npcName:11000006$ says since $npcName:11000051$ left with the first group to $map:02000023$, I should hurry and go to $map:02000035$ of $map:02000023$ and meet with $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Revealed Identity
quest.desc: A member of the Red Cape has infiltrated $map:02000025$ and kidnapped $npc:11000074$. There is no time to wait for the Royal Guard to be summoned, for $npc:11000074$'s life may be in danger. Let's hurry to $dungeonTitle:21004001$ and rescue the minister.

quest.name: Protect the Barrier of Life
quest.desc: $npc:11000031$ at $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ intuits that the barrier of life is in danger from the dark energy coming from the east part of the forest. Let's go to $dungeonTitle:21002001$, located deep in the $map:02000023$ eastern forest, and cleanse the darkness!
quest.complete: Follow the open road at $map:02000066$, go inside $map:02000179$, and speak with $npcName:11000032$

quest.name: Honest Logs
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$ of $map:02000051$, having shared that an eagle from distant seas came and delivered news of ghost pirates, expressed curiosity in regards to the secret logs that could potentially reveal the identity of the pirate captain.
quest.manual: Defeat $npc:23000015$ in the $dungeonTitle:20010001$ dungeon and acquire $item:39000032$

quest.name: The Secret of the Clocktower
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$, having a memorial service in $map:02000049$, said that an ominous energy was felt from the northwest skies, and that I should observe it before something bad occurs.

quest.name: Real Friendship
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ says to go find Katramus, whom $npcName:11000006$$ mentioned, and bring back every clue that could help find Lennon or Eve.

quest.name: End of a Long Parting
quest.desc: Join $npcName:11000006$ in the $dungeonTitle:21017001$ slave rescue.

quest.name: Turn Back Time!
quest.desc: $npc:11000003$ of $map:02000001$, sharing the story of the $map:02000309$ robbery incident, said with confidence that the culprit who stole the time key had to have gone to $dungeonTitle:21008001$. Could $npc:11000003$'s assumption be right? Let's go to $dungeonTitle:21008001$ and check it out.

quest.name: In die Hochlande
quest.desc:
Die Mchte der Finsternis haben ihre Aufmerksamkeit den Sieben Helden zugewandt. Die beiden einzigen, die weiter im Blickpunkt der ffentlichkeit stehen, sind $npc:11000134$ und $npcName:11000601$. Es liegt an Allon und dir, sie vor dem sogenannten zerlumpten Geist zu beschtzen.
Begib dich nach $map:02000051$ und beschtze $npcName:11000134$.

quest.name: Die Prfung des Kriegers
quest.desc: $npcName:11003421$ weigert sich, dich nach $map:02000051$ zu lassen, ohne dass du seine Prfung bestanden hast. Gehe zur $map:02000010$ und bezwinge $npcNamePlural:21090102$ und $npcNamePlural:21000088$.

quest.name: Nach dem Angriff
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000134$ hat sich der Kriegsgruppe angeschlossen, die die geheimnisvolle Gestalt in Lumpen verfolgt, welche die Stadt angriff. Triff dich mit der Schamanin der Stadt, $npcName:11000039$, und warne sie vor der Gefahr.
Wenn du das Gebiet ungewollt verlsst, dann sprich mit $npcName:11000289$ in $map:02000051$, um ins $map:52010033$ zurckzukehren.

quest.name: Wolfmdchen
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ ist fort und sucht nach Arznei, um die ganzen Verwundeten zu behandeln. Sie hat $npcName:11000136$ beauftragt, in der Zwischenzeit auf das Krankenhaus aufzupassen, aber anscheinend muss sie dich etwas fragen...

quest.name: Schalen der Genesung
quest.desc:
Die Schalen des $npcName:21000267$s knnen als Arzneimittel verwendet werden, um Verwundete zu versorgen. Diese Kreaturen leben gern in der Nhe von Lavastrmen an Orten wie der $map:02000010$.
Sammle ein paar Schalen fr $npcName:11000136$. Falls du dich nicht um dringendere Angelegenheiten kmmern musst.

quest.name: Ehrenamtlicher Arzt
quest.desc: $npcName:11000136$ mchte, dass du mit ihrer Arznei die Verletzten behandelst. Du bist kein Arzt, aber was haben wir zu verlieren?

quest.name: Plneschmieden in Perion
quest.desc: Du hast endlich einen verantwortungsvollen Erwachsenen gefunden. Erzhle $npcName:11000039$, was du in $map:02000051$ zu tun hast.

quest.name: Die verschollenen Krieger
quest.desc: $npcName:11003422$ sagte, die Kriegsgruppe sei berfallen worden. Du solltest nach weiteren berlebenden suchen.

quest.name: Die Verletzte
quest.desc: Du hast $npcName:11003423$ aus der Kriegsgruppe gefunden, aber sie ist schwer verletzt. Finde etwas in der Nhe, mit dem du ihre Wunden versorgen kannst.

quest.name: Kriegspfad
quest.desc: Trotz deiner Bemhungen war $npcName:11003423$ zu schwer verwundet und konnte nicht gerettet werden. Bevor sie starb, erzhlte sie, dass die Kriegsgruppe in Richtung $map:02000048$ unterwegs ist.

quest.name: Die Eindringlinge
quest.desc: Du hast $npcName:11000541$ bei der $map:02000048$ getroffen. Sie scheint etwas ber die Kriegsgruppe zu wissen, aber sie weigert sich, etwas zu verraten, bis sich nicht jemand um die $npcNamePlural:21000065$, $npcNamePlural:21090082$ und $npcNamePlural:21091082$ gekmmert hat.
quest.manual: Bezwinge die $npcNamePlural:21000065$ an der $map:02000048$ |Bezwinge die $npcNamePlural:21090082$ an der $map:02000048$. |Bezwinge die $npcNamePlural:21091082$ an der $map:02000048$.

quest.name: Das Ende der Jagd
quest.desc: Die Kriegsgruppe sollte sich immer noch im Gebiet $map:02000046$ aufhalten. Aber sie wurden aus dem Hinterhalt angegriffen, und jetzt ist das Gebiet von Monstern umzingelt. Du musst $npcName:11000134$ finden, bevor ihm etwas zustt.
quest.complete: Suche nach $npcName:11000134$ auf der Spitze des Gebiets $map:02000046$.

quest.name: Brennender Hinweis
quest.desc: Die Spuren von $npcName:11000134$ enden auf der Spitze des Gebiets $map:02000046$. Wohin sind $npcName:11000134$ und $npcName:11000009$ verschwunden? Anscheinend sind die Fackeln in der Nhe vor Kurzem angezndet worden. Vielleicht solltest du sie erneut anznden und sehen, was passiert.
quest.manual: Znde die erste Fackel an. |Znde die zweite Fackel an. |Znde die dritte Fackel an. |Znde die vierte Fackel an.
quest.complete: Suche nach dem verborgenen Tempel auf der Spitze des Gebiets $map:02000046$.

quest.name: In der Sanduhr
quest.desc:
Du hast den Eingang zum verborgenen Tempel auf der Spitze des Gebiets $map:02000046$ gefunden. Hchstwahrscheinlich befinden sich $npcName:11000134$ und $npcName:11000009$ dort.
Wenn du das Gebiet ungewollt verlsst, dann untersuche den $npc:11003430$ im Gebiet $map:02000046$, um zurckzukehren.

quest.name: Sohn des Oberhaupts
quest.desc: $npcName:11000134$ griff seinen eigenen Sohn $npcName:11000009$ an. Was kann ihn dazu veranlasst haben? Da sowohl Vater als auch Sohn bewusstlos sind, solltest du mit $npcName:11000009$ im $map:52010033$ sprechen.

quest.name: Die geheimnisvolle Frau
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000009$ ist sich nicht sicher, was mit $npcName:11000134$ geschehen ist. Der sogenannte zerlumpte Geist scheint beteiligt zu sein als auch eine geheimnisvolle Frau.
Wenn jemand $npcName:11000134$s Verstand kontrolliert, wer tut das... und wie?

quest.name: Aus der Dunkelheit zurckgekehrt
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ schien besonders verstrt zu sein, nachdem sie hrte, was $npcName:11000009$ zu sagen hatte. Sie bat dich, sie in der $map:52010034$ zu treffen.

quest.name: Geheime Behandlung
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ ist berzeugt davon, dass der Angriff auf Perion von den Inakimo angefhrt wurde. Dieser Stamm verschwand vor einer Generation in die Finsterlande. Sie hat die Magie des Stammes schon einmal gesehen und glaubt, dass sie wei, wie die Krankheit von $npcName:11000134$ zu behandeln ist. Sammle $item:30000864$ in den $map:02000095$.
quest.manual: Hole $item:30000864$ aus der Quelle in den $map:02000095$.

quest.name: Die schlfrige Hexe
quest.desc: Die Medizin von $npcName:11000039$ wird verhindern, dass es $npcName:11000134$ schlechter geht, aber es ist kein echtes Heilmittel. $npcName:11000746$, die Hexe vom $map:02000103$ in Ellinia, kennt viele Rituale, um schwarze Magie zu reinigen. Suche sie auf.

quest.name: Ein gttliches Wesen
quest.desc: Das Ritual zum Heilen des Stammesfrsten erfordert reine, gttliche Energie. Und als Hexe hat $npcName:11000746$ keinen Zugang zu dieser Art von Energie. Aber wie dem auch sei, die Einhrner vom $map:02000053$ knnen vielleicht helfen.

quest.name: Einhorn-Rettungsgruppe
quest.desc: $npcName:11000027$, das Einhorn, das du beim $map:02000053$ getroffen hast, bentigt dringend deine Hilfe. All seine Einhornfreunde wurden durch schwarze Energie verwandelt. Du brauchst die Hilfe jener Einhrner, wenn du $npcName:11000134$ retten willst...

quest.name: Aura des Lichts
quest.desc: $npcName:11000027$ und seine Freunde haben dir die Aura des Lichts gewhrt, die du brauchst, um $npcName:11000134$ zu retten. Kehre zu $npc:11000039$ im $map:52010032$ zurck.

quest.name: Ein Hoffnungsschimmer
quest.desc: Das Ritual hat $npcName:11000134$ erfolgreich von der Dunkelheit befreit, aber...

quest.name: Der Wchter von Perion
quest.desc:
Obwohl das Luterungsritual erfolgreich war, kehrte der Fluch von $npcName:11000134$ nach nur wenigen Augenblicken wieder zurck. $npc:11000039$ vermutet, dass die Inakimo einen Weg gefunden haben, den $npcName:11003392$en zu verderben. Dieser ist ein Wchtergolem, der in einem magischen Bndnis mit den Stammesfrsten von $map:02000051$ steht.
$npcName:11003391$ brach auf, um das $map:52010029$ zu erkunden, und kam nie zurck. Begib dich dorthin und rette sowohl ihn als auch den $npcName:11003392$en aus den Fngen der Inakimo!
quest.manual: Begib dich ber die $map:52010031$ in das $map:52010029$ und rette dann den Wchter $npcName:11003392$ und $npcName:11003391$.

quest.name: Perions kltestes Herz
quest.desc: Du hast dich... mit $npcName:11003391$ im Gebiet $map:52010029$ zerstritten. Was wirst du tun, um ihn wieder auf deine Seite zu bringen?

quest.name: Eine schnelle Entschuldigung
quest.desc:
Nichts drckt eine Entschuldigung besser aus als ein Geschenk, das man gratis bekommen hat. Schenke $npcName:11003391$ ein wenig Weihrauch, damit er dir eure frhere Meinungsverschiedenheit verzeiht.
$npcName:11000289$ sollte dich zum Haus von $npc:11003391$ fhren knnen.

quest.name: Hausbesuch
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000289$ sagte, $npcName:11003391$ sehe deprimiert aus. Begib dich zum Haus von $npcName:11003391$ im $map:52010027$ und gib dein Geschenk ab.
Wenn du das Gebiet ungewollt verlsst, dann sprich mit $npcName:11000289$ in $map:02000051$, um zurckzukehren.

quest.name: Ein zurckgelassenes Geschenk
quest.desc: Du hast $npcName:11003391$ gerade verpasst. Brich in sein Haus ein und lasse dein Entschuldigungsgeschenk zurck, damit er es spter findet.

quest.name: Eine Wendung zum Schlechten
quest.desc: Drauen passiert etwas. Du bist dir sicher, dass du Schreie hrst. Geh raus ins $map:52010027$ und schau nach, was passiert.

quest.name: Verdchtiger Sieg
quest.desc:
Du bist im $map:52010027$ auf $npcName:11003431$ getroffen, das Oberhaupt der Inakimo. Aber wohin ist er verschwunden? Und wer ist diese Viper, von der er gesprochen hat?
Kehre frs Erste schnell nach $map:02000051$ zurck.

quest.name: Ein unerwarteter Raubzug
quest.desc:
Du bist nach $map:02000051$ zurckgekehrt und hast festgestellt, dass es von den Inakimo angegriffen wird. Offenbar war $npcName:11003431$ nur eine Ablenkung...
$npcName:11000289$ wird die Zivilisten in Sicherheit bringen. Du musst zurck in die $map:52010031$ gelangen und dich mit $npcName:11000078$ und $npcName:11000009$ zusammenschlieen.

quest.name: Rette den Wchter
quest.desc:
$map:02000051$ wird keinen weiteren Angriff berstehen, wenn die Inakimo es schaffen, die Kontrolle ber die Golems des $npcName:11003392$en zu erlangen. Whrend $npcName:11000078$ und $npcName:11000009$ gegen die Hauptstreitkrfte der Inakimo kmpfen, musst du dich zur $map:02000313$ davonschleichen und den $npcName:11003392$ aus seiner Gefangenschaft befreien.
Gelange durch den Geheimgang dorthin.

quest.name: Die Mission des Stammesfrsten
quest.desc: Begib dich ber den $npcName:11003468$ in der $map:52010031$ zur $map:02000313$ und rette den $npcName:11003392$en vor den Inakimo.

quest.name: Namid anfeuern
quest.desc: Nach einem langen Kampf fielen $npcName:11000134$, $npcName:11000078$ und der $npcName:11003392$ bei der Verteidigung von $map:02000051$. $npcName:11000039$ gibt sich die Schuld, nicht gengend unternommen zu haben, um sie zu retten.

quest.name: Ein neues Oberhaupt fr ein neues Zeitalter
quest.desc: $npcName:11003457$, der neue Stammesfrst von $map:02000051$, hat einen Eid geschworen, den Kampf gegen die Dunkelheit zu untersttzen.

quest.name: Kater auf Kran
quest.desc: $npcName:11000366$ luft im $map:02000139$ herum und ist krank vor Sorge um ihren verschwundenen Kater, $npcName:11000367$. Vielleicht knntest du auf den Kran hinter ihr klettern und den armen kleinen Kater finden.
quest.complete: Klettere auf den Kran und suche $npcName:11000367$.

quest.name: Kater auf Kran
quest.desc: $npcName:11000366$ luft im $map:02000139$ herum und ist krank vor Sorge um ihren verschwundenen Kater, $npcName:11000367$. Vielleicht knntest du auf den Kran hinter ihr klettern und den armen kleinen Kater finden.
quest.complete: Klettere auf den Kran und suche $npcName:11000367$.

quest.name: Die Trennung
quest.desc: $npcName:11000367$ ist mit einer Katze durchgebrannt. berbringe $npcName:11000366$ die Neuigkeit.

quest.name: Die Trennung
quest.desc: $npcName:11000367$ ist mit einer Katze durchgebrannt. berbringe $npcName:11000366$ die Neuigkeit.

quest.name: Balloon Grabber
quest.desc: Let's retrieve the balloon over the tree above the portal to get to $map:02000116$. $npc:11000389$, who sells balloons in $map:02000115$, wants it.
quest.manual: Use rock climbing skills to retrieve the balloon from the tree above the $map:02000116$ portal

quest.name: Into the Woods
quest.desc: Let's deliver the packed lunch to $npc:11000128$ in $map:02000116$.

quest.name: Unter seiner Wrde
quest.desc: $npc:11000065$ beklagt sich darber, dass aus dem sdlichen Teil von $map:02000100$, wo seine am wenigsten bevorzugten Whler leben, ein schrecklicher Gestank kommt. Hilf ihm, diesen Teil der Stadt zu subern.
quest.manual: Installiere Wasserreiniger im sdlichen Teil von $map:02000100$.

quest.name: Unter seiner Wrde
quest.desc: $npc:11000065$ beklagt sich darber, dass aus dem sdlichen Teil von $map:02000100$, wo seine am wenigsten bevorzugten Whler leben, ein schrecklicher Gestank kommt. Hilf ihm, diesen Teil der Stadt zu subern.
quest.manual: Installiere Wasserreiniger im sdlichen Teil von $map:02000100$.

quest.name: Das Interview deines Lebens
quest.desc: Um sich fr deine Dienste erkenntlich zu zeigen, hat $npc:11000065$ dich betreffend ein Empfehlungsschreiben an die Goldus-Gruppe geschickt. Begib dich fr ein Bewerbungsgesprch ins $map:02000189$.

quest.name: Das Interview deines Lebens
quest.desc: Um sich fr deine Dienste erkenntlich zu zeigen, hat $npc:11000065$ dich betreffend ein Empfehlungsschreiben an die Goldus-Gruppe geschickt. Begib dich fr ein Bewerbungsgesprch ins $map:02000189$.

quest.name: Gelobt sei Goldus
quest.desc: Als neuester Angestellter der Goldus-Gruppe ist es Zeit, dass du $npc:11000252$ kennenlernst und ihm die Firmenhymne vorsingst. Der Text zur Hymne $npc:11000477$ hngt an der Wand neben ihm.

quest.name: Gelobt sei Goldus
quest.desc: Als neuester Angestellter der Goldus-Gruppe ist es Zeit, dass du $npc:11000252$ kennenlernst und ihm die Firmenhymne vorsingst. Der Text zur Hymne $npc:11000477$ hngt an der Wand neben ihm.

quest.name: Demonic Roots
quest.desc: $npc:11000169$ requested that I go to $map:02000315$ and steal the $item:30000190$ from $npc:23100025$. Although I am bothered by his attitude (he seems to ask others for help in every difficult situation), I will aid him this one time, like $npc:11000169$ said to.

quest.name: Geheimnis des Tanzes
quest.desc:
$npc:11000542$ liebt den Tanz. Daher hat er sich entschieden, einige $npcPlural:21000069$ aufzuziehen, um mit ihnen zu tanzen. Allerdings sehen diese $npcPlural:21000069$ verglichen mit denen, die du in der Wildnis hast tanzen sehen, ziemlich traurig aus.
Jage einige wilde $npc:21000069$s beim $map:02000049$ und lerne ihr Geheimnis kennen.

quest.name: Geheimnis des Tanzes
quest.desc:
$npc:11000542$ liebt den Tanz. Daher hat er sich entschieden, einige $npcPlural:21000069$ aufzuziehen, um mit ihnen zu tanzen. Allerdings sehen diese $npcPlural:21000069$ verglichen mit denen, die du in der Wildnis hast tanzen sehen, ziemlich traurig aus.
Jage einige wilde $npc:21000069$s beim $map:02000049$ und lerne ihr Geheimnis kennen.

quest.name: Tanz der Kakteen
quest.desc: Du hast $itemPlural:30000029$ gefunden, als du $npcPlural:21000069$ gejagt hast. Ist es das, was Tans bentigt, um seine $npcPlural:21000069:$ zum Tanzen zu bringen?

quest.name: Tanzender Kaktus
quest.desc: Du hast die $itemPlural:30000029$ gefunden, als du $npcPlural:21000069$ gejagt hast. Ist es das, was Tans bentigt, um $itemPlural:30000029$ selbst herzustellen?

quest.name: Rain, Rain, Come Again
quest.desc: Worried about the lack of rain in the Perion region, $npc:11000039$ set up totems in the lower area of $map:02000049$. Let's hold a rain ritual in front of all the totems in $map:02000049$.
quest.manual: Hold a rain ritual in front of all the totems in $map:02000049$

quest.name: The Enemy Within
quest.desc: $npc:11001043$'s job was to make sure the core technology of $map:02000277$ doesn't leak out. Unfortunately, there was a traitor from within; one of the team members was bribed by the mafia and stole the technology. The most urgent task at hand is to destroy the robotic weapons by manipulating the system, while simultaneously escaping the area. I have to destroy all of $npc:21000245$, $npc:21000247$, and $npc:21000242$ in $map:02000277$.
quest.manual: Destroy the killer robot weapons devastating $map:02000277$

quest.name: Heavy Security
quest.desc: Fortunately, the number of dangerous robotic weapons has been greatly reduced thanks to a quick response. But it's still too early to relax! $npc:11001043$ says the ones who stole the technology will come back to $map:02000277$ in order to destroy the evidence. $npcName:11001043$ is going to do whatever possible to capture the suspects. I'll need to activate the intruder detection sensor installed in $map:02000277$.
quest.manual: Install the intruder detection sensors in various spots around $map:02000277$

quest.name: QUESTDESCRIPTION_20002245_NAME
quest.manual: Search for clues in $map:02000129$ to find out the truth behind the Ultimate Transcendence

quest.name: QUESTDESCRIPTION_20002250_NAME
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$ stated that through combining the $item:30000538$ we may be able to discover the history of how the ancient ancestors of the Runebladers collected the "Ultimate Transcendence" and find the method to restore its power. Let's watch $npcName:11000031$ combine $item:30000538$.

quest.name: Tria in der Krise
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000069$ warnt davor, dass die Mchte der Finsternis auf Tria marschieren. $npcName:11000064$ schart die Knigswache um sich, aber es gibt einfach nicht genug Krfte, um die Stadt zu schtzen. Halte die Verteidigung aufrecht, whrend $npcName:11000069$ Verstrkung holt!
Wenn du das Gebiet ungewollt verlsst, dann sprich mit $npcName:11001238$, um zurckzukehren.
quest.manual: Halte die Armee von $npcName:11001698$ beim $map:52000068$ auf. <font color="#909090">Wenn du das Gebiet ungewollt verlsst, dann sprich mit $npcName:11001238$, um zurckzukehren.</font>

quest.name: Der Schutz von Tria
quest.desc:
Dem Feind ist es nicht gelungen, Tria einzunehmen. Aber viele Wachen sind in der Schlacht gefallen. Sprich gemeinsam mit $npc:11000076$ zu den Verwundeten auf dem $map:52000068$.
Wenn du das Gebiet ungewollt verlsst, dann sprich mit $npcName:11001238$, um zurckzukehren.

quest.name: Zusammenschluss
quest.desc: Der Maple-Bund bentigt deine Hilfe. Sprich mit Kaiserin $npcName:11001969$ in der $map:52000087$.

quest.name: Verschrobene Interessen
quest.desc:
Die meisterhafte Magierin $npcName:11000042$ hat einen Zauber ersonnen, der den Lichtstein verwendet, um die magische Kraft der Lumarian aufzuspren. Ihre Expertise wird ber das Gelingen der Mission, $npcName:11001698$ zu finden, entscheiden. Aber sie weigert sich standhaft, ihren theoretischen Elfenbeinturm zu verlassen.
Versuche, ihre Meinung zu ndern.

quest.name: Feuer trifft Eis
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ hat sich endlich dazu durchgerungen, dich auf die Mission zu begleiten. Beginne deine Mission, indem du dich mit ihr im Gebiet $map:52000088$ triffst.

quest.name: berreste von Drachenmagie
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ hat lumarianische Magie ausgemacht, die aus Runensteinen im Gebiet $map:52000088$ entstrmt. Sieh dir diese Steine genauer an.

quest.name: Bad im Feuer
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ ist sich sicher, dass der Drache, den ihr verfolgt, wirklich ein Lumarian ist oder zumindest mit den Lumarian in irgendeiner Verbindung steht. Aufbauend auf dem, was ihr schon gefunden habt, solltet ihr nach weiteren Hinweisen im Gebiet $map:52000089$ bei den $map:02000268$n suchen.

quest.name: Der verwundete Drache
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ kann aus den Schuppen eines Drachen eine Menge Informationen gewinnen. Untersuche die Schuppen im Gebiet $map:52000089$.

quest.name: Teleportations-Trittbrettfahrer
quest.desc:
Die Drachenschuppen im Gebiet $map:52000089$ waren mit schwarzer Magie befleckt. Der Zauber von $npcName:11000042$ deutet auf die Finsterlande hin, aber zuerst muss sie zum $map:02000146$, um ein genaueres Ergebnis zu bekommen.
Sprich mit $npcName:11003089$ am $map:02000146$.
